title: Error: 500 Something's gone Hextechnically Wrong!
body: I was accepted for PBE testing and clicked on the sign up email, but the website gets redirected to the Error: 500

replies.body: Are you still running into this error with the webpage? Some players mentioned that the page has stopped throwing up this error, so give it another go and let me know what happens!
Yes, the same thing happens when i use the webpage on my laptop. I tried on my phone but it still doesnt work.

Interesting! Have you tried temporarily enabling a VPN such as [**Hotspot Shield**](https://www.hotspotshield.com/) or [**Cyberghost**](http://www.cyberghostvpn.com/en_us) to attempt to bypass the error?
